snippet.title: (SAGE2020) Kirby's Halloween Adventure Version 1.2 (RELEASE TRAILER)
snippet.description:
DOWNLOAD LINKS:
============================
Romhacking,net: http://www.romhacking.net/hacks/4454/
SAGE: https://sonicfangameshq.com/forums/showcase/kirbys-halloween-adventure-2020-update.783/

MIRROR DOWNLOAD:
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1yAHZ2fwLrJK0o3vqX57LlDInegURuxdW?usp=sharing

This is it, after 1 whole year of development, the definitive version of Kirby's Halloween Adventure has been completed!
Now having way more level design changes and brand new stuff you'll see on this trailer.
I thank you all who waited patiently for this video's release, I'm super grateful as this is easily the biggest project I've ever completed.

Enjoy #SAGE2020 's release of Halloween Adventure! The downloads are above, I hope you have a great day!

#romhack #kirby #hack #romhacking #halloween

FCEUX:
1- Run FCEUX
2- Go to Config, then Timing
3- Select overclocking and set it at a large number (100) will do fine
4- Go to Config, PPU and select Old PPU
And presto! Smooth as butter gameplay in your hands, no more lag from too many enemies or every time you use Spark!

Mesen:
1- Run Mesen
2- Go to Options
3- Go to emulation
4- Go to overclocking and hit a large number 100-200, say bye-bye to lag!
